str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Supplication, prayer, entreaty. From deomai; a petition.
Supply, provision, equipment, support. From epichoregeo; contribution.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of basis; literally, to disembark; figuratively, to eventuate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.
